subject: Annual pension valuation update
body:
Dear Tomo Connor,

Your annual pension statement for the Connor Pension Plan is now available.

Current Value: £127,456.78
Contributions this year: £12,000.00
Employer contributions: £6,000.00
Growth: +8.2%

subject: Trust Fund Reallocation Notice – Action Required
body:
Dear Tomo,

As part of our annual review, we are proposing a reallocation of assets in the Connor Family Trust.

Current allocation:
- Equities: 60%
- Bonds: 30%
- Cash: 10%

Proposed allocation:
- Equities: 55%
- Bonds: 35%
- Cash: 10%

Please review and respond by December 31, 2024.

Total trust value: £854,691.34

Contact your relationship manager, Sarah Chen, at 020 7123 4567 for questions.

Meridian Trust Management

subject: Maximize your ISA allowance before April!
body:
Dear Tomo,

Don't miss out on your £20,000 ISA allowance for 2024/25!

IMPORTANT TAX INFORMATION:
Capital gains on investments outside an ISA may be subject to tax. The CGT allowance for 2024/25 is £3,000.

Open a Stocks & Shares ISA today and enjoy:
- No capital gains tax on profits
- No tax on dividends
- Flexible access to your money

Start investing now: https://investorbank.co.uk/isa

Terms apply. Capital at risk.

Investor Bank
